intro_only_event_multi_specialmatch_leaf:
A special Champion Stadium is happening
right now!

And the final opponent in that Champion
Stadium is...
me, Leaf! I’ve become a Pasio Neo Champion!

I’ll test just how much love you have for Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

You’d better be prepared, because you won’t be
able to beat me without some serious love!
